name: Maze 3D
description: A cube maze, moving from green to red, can move forward, backward, left, right, up and down. A total of 10 levels, 3 modes, 4 auxiliary functions. The first game will randomly generate a maze, and automatically load in next play, or randomly generated again if you want.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5, 3.2 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 450 MB available space
